summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming the sale of negotiable bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of $460,000.00 authorized by Ordinance No. 26854, for the purpose of refunding certain bonds of the City of Seattle known as Seattle Funding Bonds of 1891; authorizing the issuance and delivery of said refunding bonds; providing the form and details of said bonds, and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
